# Test import order - WebEngine before offscreen QApplication
try:
    from PyQt6.QtWebEngineWidgets import QWebEngineView
    print\(''WebEngine import succeeded BEFORE QApplication''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''WebEngine import failed: {e}''\)
import os
os.environ[''QT_QPA_PLATFORM''] = ''offscreen''
from PyQt6.QtWidgets import QApplication
app = QApplication\([]\)
try:
    from PyQt6.QtWebEngineWidgets import QWebEngineView
    print\(''WebEngine import succeeded AFTER offscreen QApplication''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''WebEngine import failed after app: {e}''\)
")
